name: Project Barry Demo
description:
Crusty old game from my gamejolt page*, thought I would publish it here as well. Requires Flash Player 11 to run. Made w/ Scratch 2 Offline Editor, converted to executable with junebeetle and sfw2exe.

If you want to make a game into an executable or swf file, these links will be helpful:

https://asentientbot.github.io/converter/

http://www.swffileplayer.com/

https://sourceforge.net/projects/swf2exe/files/

*https://gamejolt.com/games/projectbarrydemo/511697 - original
